mapper.insert: insert into sys_user (account_, password_, phone_, sex_, user_name, avatar_, user_type, dept_id, locked_, usable_, create_time) values (#{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{locked,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{usable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update sys_user set account_ = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password_ = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_ = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex_ = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, avatar_ = #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_type = #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, locked_ = #{locked,jdbcType=INTEGER}, usable_ = #{usable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id_, account_, password_, phone_, sex_, user_name, avatar_, user_type, dept_id, locked_, usable_, create_time from sys_user where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
